name: Vincera City
description:
A dialog driven point&click adventure. (no point&click features yet.)

The 4 color is People's name (Grey, Scarlett, White and de Niro)

The gun is the MacGuffin of the story.

The story takes place in Vincera City, belonging to a parallel dystopian world.

You play as a young detective, Nick Grey, who is about to get pushed to the limit of his ability in this fateful case.

Experience a responsive dialog system and decide how the story unfolds. 

We are only at the beginning phase of the game, so everything is rough. But dialogues are still written with heart and branching story lines in mind.
